```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

library(RPackProj)
data("student")

str(student)
head(student)

plot <- plot_ly(data = student, x = ~name, y = ~mark, type = "bar") %>%
  layout(title = "Student Scores",
         xaxis = list(title = "Student Names"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Scores"))

plot
